# AVCaptureColorSpace.HLG_BT2020

**Case**

The BT.2020 wide color space that uses Illuminant D65 as the white point and Hybrid Log-Gamma (HLG) as the transfer function.

## Declaration

```swift
case HLG_BT2020
```

## Color spaces

- **AVCaptureColorSpace.sRGB**: The standard RGB color space.
- **AVCaptureColorSpace.P3_D65**: The P3 D65 wide color space that uses Illuminant D65 as the white point.
- **AVCaptureColorSpace.appleLog**: The Apple Log Color space, which uses BT2020 as the color primaries, and an Apple-defined Log curve as a transfer function.
- **AVCaptureColorSpace.appleLog2**: The Apple Log 2 Color space, which uses Apple Gamut as the color primaries, and an Apple defined Log curve as a transfer function. When you set this as the active color space on an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice], any [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] connected to the same [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] is made inactive (its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection/isActive] property returns `false`).
